website_summaries.verdict: A beautiful wooden bottle opener crafted from Peruvian walnut hardwood and a magnetic backing to catch your caps.
pros: Can hold dozens of bottle caps at a time
Holds tight to the side of your refrigerator
Holds caps until you take them down
cons: This model is a little pricey for a bottle opener

customer_reviews.title: It works exactly as it should
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my husband for Christmas. What drew me to it is the fact that it is handmade in the USA, and that it does need to be screwed into a wall. Th magnets are very strong, and it doesn't budge from the front of the refrigerator when a bottle is opened. It is solid as a rock. We got the basic mahogany color to match our cabinets. My husband, who rarely gets excited about gifts, has told me several times how much he likes it. It is kind of expensive for something with such a basic use, but it is well made and works great for my husband who brews his own beer at home. Good purchase!
customer_reviews.author: K Mawhinney

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and very convenient.
customer_reviews.text: Best bottle opener I've ever used. Right out the box, all one has to do is stick it to the fridge and then enjoy all those frosty cold beverages you've been putting off. The magnet is super strong and i've yet to see a single bottle cap miss the mark. Friends and visitors enjoy raiding my fridge just to use the opener, it's that good.
customer_reviews.author: wheezal

customer_reviews.title: What an awesome idea. I worked with rare earth magnets before ...
customer_reviews.text: What an awesome idea. I worked with rare earth magnets before and they are very powerful. Finally someone found an important use for them. I got my NasonWorks Beer Bottle opener for my basement bar and mounted it on the wall. Works as advertised. A bottle cap hasn't hit the floor once... not even close. I've surprised friends and relatives and now they're doing the same. My son had me buy him some IBC bottled root beer so he could get in on the fun. lol
customer_reviews.author: Smitty

customer_reviews.title: Magnets not strong enough
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is solidly built and looks great, however it slides around a lot on the fridge when trying to use it, which leads me to believe the magnets are not strong enough. I have another magnetic bottle opener (from a different manufacturer) that doesn't budge at all during use, so I expected that this one would be the same way, but not so. It would have also been nice if this model had some pads on the back to prevent scratching of the fridge. Will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Consumer

customer_reviews.title: great magnet hold and it does what it says -catches ...
customer_reviews.text: Worth the money! We are using it on the side of our fridge....great magnet hold and it does what it says -catches all the caps without dropping them on the floor. I would recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: dilli

customer_reviews.title: Great looking bottle cap opener
customer_reviews.text: This was the surprise hit at Christmas. Once opened and affixed to the fridge, people kept opening beer bottles just to watch the caps fall and quickly get stuck to the magnet encased in the wood. Lots of fun, looks great and very functional.
customer_reviews.author: L. Freeman

customer_reviews.title: Bought this as a gift for my boyfriend, who ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my boyfriend, who absolutely loves it - the magnet is incredibly strong and catches all of the caps that come floating its way. We put it through a trial of standing on the other side of the kitchen and throwing bottle caps at it, and it caught every one! Thumbs up.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: As expected.
customer_reviews.text: Nice novelty opener. Holds tight to a metal surface while opening bottles. The included screw mount kit replaces the two screws holding the opener to the wood. I haven't used the screw mounts, however.
customer_reviews.author: RJF

customer_reviews.title: Great bottle opener.
customer_reviews.text: It works great! I just stuck it to the fridge magnetically so when I pull out a cold one, I just close the door and pop the top. And it catches the caps quite well too. I haven't got to 63 but it held 33 before a cap slid off. Worth the purchase in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Arrived so fast!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered it on a Monday night and it was here by Friday! No scratches or mistakes in the customized initials. The magnet is so strong too! Can't wait to give it to my dad to add to his bar:)
customer_reviews.author: Manajojo

customer_reviews.title: Great Opener and cap catcher! FIVE STARS
customer_reviews.text: Josh: Great product and gorgeous piece of walnut. The chrome opener against the stained walnut is impeccable. The strong magnet which "catches" the opened bottle cap works better than expected. As an aside, instead of refunding $5.00 for my review, treat a child to something tasty or better still, donate it to your favorite charity. Thank you! J. Peter Bushman, Phila., PA
customer_reviews.author: J. Peter Bushman

customer_reviews.title: Great gift.
customer_reviews.text: I sent this as a gift to a friend and she loves it. Magnets are very strong so it is secure on fridge door. And the cap catcher holds many caps. Cool looking, too.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: Quality product, very well made. Have had it for a year now, and it still works great. Magnets hold it strong to the beer frig.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product. Really works well in the Man Cave ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. Really works well in the Man Cave where we dont want loose caps flying around. This is my third one, and a gift, so I know they will like it.
customer_reviews.author: CJB

customer_reviews.title: Excellent gift!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband for the holidays, and we love it! Great quality, excellent craftsmanship! I do wish it held a few more caps before needing to be removed, but that's a small detail. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Why didn't I buy this one years ago?! ...
customer_reviews.text: Why didn't I buy this one years ago?! I was going to mount it on the wall by the trash can. I pulled it out of the box and just stuck it on the refrigerator. It hasn't moved yet!
customer_reviews.author: Mike Crackel

customer_reviews.title: Unique!
customer_reviews.text: Super strong magnets! Original and exactly what I was hoping for!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Gave this as a gift and it they loved it. It works exactly as described and the 2 mounting options (magnetic or using the screws) made it versatile. *It has been so well loved that I decided to get one for myself. It work perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Glenna

customer_reviews.title: Great product and I would certainly recommend to others
customer_reviews.text: Extremely well made and exactly as advertised. This sticks (magnetically) strongly to the side of my fridge and no problems with it trying to come off as I open bottles. I've already gotten several positive comments about this bottle opener and have a pile of caps to show for its use. Great product and I would certainly recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: J. B. Spinks

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, as described
customer_reviews.text: Holds super well to my fridge and does not budge when uncapping bottles. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Porterfield

customer_reviews.title: Loved it!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I had a friend who made me one recently. I loved it so much that I wanted to start buying them as gifts for people. I looked all over for a product that looked sleak and had a strong enough magnet... THIS IS IT! Nothing bad to say. Super strong magnet, looks great mounted. Ready to use right out of the box. Also, NasonWorks seems to handle their business in a very professional manner.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Duffy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the beer fridge!
customer_reviews.text: Rock solid opener. Got this for Fathers Day and it's impressive. Built out of a solid piece of wood, super strong neodymium magnets and an opener, this is just what I needed for the beer fridge!
customer_reviews.author: Viruside

customer_reviews.title: We love it
customer_reviews.text: This is a really cute gadget and it works very well!
customer_reviews.author: Arlette in the Netherlands

customer_reviews.title: Most guest enjoy using it at his house
customer_reviews.text: Got as gift for a friend, and he loves it. Most guest enjoy using it at his house, it is quite the hit! Looks great, super solid build. Very sturdy magnets connect it to the fridge without slipping. Can hold about 10+ bottle caps before missing any.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher K.

customer_reviews.title: So cool!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the coolest, smartest opener you will ever find!! Catches the cap every time...an attractive piece for your wall....
customer_reviews.author: jad

customer_reviews.title: The magnet to hang it on the fridge is super sturdy - it makes this so easy to use
customer_reviews.text: The magnet to hang it on the fridge is super sturdy - it makes this so easy to use. Taking the test to find out just how many bottle caps it can hold!
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Bottle opener looks good and does what it says.
customer_reviews.text: Bottle opener really stays on the refrigerator and is still collecting bottle caps..... A lot of fun when you have people over.
customer_reviews.author: Phil R

customer_reviews.title: I ordered this for my husband's birthday to put near ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my husband's birthday to put near the beer fridge. He loves it. The magnet is strong enough to stick to the fridge and open the beer. I was skeptical of the magnet. I didn't think it would catch the cap.. It did perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Pankus

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to our kitchen
customer_reviews.text: This opener works so well and it looks great. Bought it as a gift and it is used every day! Well worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: carolyn

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a present for my boyfriend on his 21st. A very classy and well-made kitchen accessory. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Mays

customer_reviews.title: Really nice!
customer_reviews.text: Works like magic! It is functional, fun, and fashionable. Great quality, too.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl

customer_reviews.title: ... our second magnetic cap catcher and by far the best. We currently have it mounted on our fridge ...
customer_reviews.text: This is our second magnetic cap catcher and by far the best. We currently have it mounted on our fridge door with no issues with sliding which is awesome if you're in an apartment and don't want to wall mount. My fiance is really looking forward to having a hive of bottle caps hanging off of it haha. It's the little things in life :)
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Mccarthy

customer_reviews.title: I finally decided to get one myself and was not disappointed. Such a great and unique product
customer_reviews.text: I have always been jealous of friends with these bottle openers. I finally decided to get one myself and was not disappointed. Such a great and unique product. Everyone who sees it on the fridge is intrigued and will eventually purchase one for themselves!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Valentine

customer_reviews.title: and I am in total love with it
customer_reviews.text: I have this opener on my fridge, and I am in total love with it. Doesn't really slide around on the fridge (unless I miss 3 times then get overeager on the 4th), the magnet works AWESOME at catching bottlecaps (we have a record of 35 before we got sick of looking at them), and opening bottles is now so, so easy. I would recommend anyone and everyone has this opener. Would make a beautiful gift, too.
customer_reviews.author: Irina R

customer_reviews.title: Classy upgrade.
customer_reviews.text: Seriously awesome. Very classy looking up and the magnets work like magic. Or just really good magnets. Super easy to install as well with all hardware included for either a fridge mount or a wall mount.
customer_reviews.author: Fifty-One

customer_reviews.title: Quality and Fun Bottle Opener...Definitely a Conversation Starter!
customer_reviews.text: Very well made product, works very well on my wall. Just wished that the wood grain was more prominent as was shown in the online Amazon photos (reason for taking off a star).
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: No more "Where's the bottle opener?"
customer_reviews.text: Arrived exactly like the picture and attached to my fridge perfectly. This thing is super convenient, just open the fridge, grab a bottle and - CLINK - my beer is open before the fridge door has time to close. The magnet turns once-wayward bottlecaps into an amusing sculpture.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Duncan

customer_reviews.title: great gift for the man who has everything
customer_reviews.text: This was a Father's Day gift for my husband. Good quality, nice and sturdy. Aesthetically pleasing. Works great! We just stuck it on our fridge, though it's nice to have the option to attach to the wall. Added bonus for our household, now don't have to worry about bottle caps loose around the house.
customer_reviews.author: Kimbersayshi

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Awesone opener! Beautiful and functional. Stays put on the fridge. My husband loves it. So far hoding 20+ caps and counting!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome. Sturdy and strong magnet. Looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for a gift. Obviously I opened it to check out the item. Magnets are much stronger than I anticipated; which is great! Stuck to my fridge (pebbled surface) with no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Ceder

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Gift!
customer_reviews.text: This was a 21st birthday gift for my boyfriend and he loves it! Him and his roommates love seeing the bottle cap glob grow! The magnet is super strong and catches the bottle caps perfectly. This is a really nice product and an awesome gift for any beer drinker!
customer_reviews.author: Gabrielle

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These made such a hit with all the guys we gave them to.
customer_reviews.author: Kaie Gerstemeier

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered one as a gift and the recipient loves it! It arrived on time, in perfect condition, as described. The mounting instructions are clear and the magnet works great.
customer_reviews.author: JM

customer_reviews.title: like how theres a variety of colors to choose from
customer_reviews.text: Saw this type of opener at a friends house, and the wife couldn't stop using it. Ordered one for her as soon as we got home, like how theres a variety of colors to choose from. Now she won't let me open my own bottle, both love it, great quality too.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Pomeroy

customer_reviews.title: Very strong magnet, very well made. Went right ...
customer_reviews.text: Very strong magnet, very well made. Went right on the beer fridge and was a big hit for Father's Day!
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my dad as a Christmas present and he loves it. Attached it to our bar and it looks great and works even better! :)
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: This little gadget should be one of oprah's favorite things. Works great and is pretty handy.
customer_reviews.author: A. B. B.

customer_reviews.title: Bottle Caps as Sculpture
customer_reviews.text: Had a group of friends out for the weekend. We built the most beautiful bottle cap cascade in just 2 days! I love the product as it is high quality and it is a real conversation starter.
customer_reviews.author: B. Travnick

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great service!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product! Beautifully made by the seller himself, and very clever magnetic catcher that really does work. It was incredibly easy to hang and he included anchors if needed. I highly recommend this product and plan to keep my eye out for other products from this seller. Shipping was very quick as well, completed my purchase on the 14th and it was on my doorstep on the 18th. Included in my shipment was a handwritten note about my product and contact information in case I had questions or comments, always a nice touch!
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: I thought this looked cool, but when I saw it work
customer_reviews.text: Ok, I thought this looked cool, but when I saw it work, I knew it was cool. It's pretty amazing how it catches all of the caps. The in lays are beautiful. Perfect gift for my husband.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Waldinger

customer_reviews.title: Every beer drinker needs one!
customer_reviews.text: I love it. Also got 2 more for beer loving friends.
customer_reviews.author: Dougal2K

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and well made!
customer_reviews.text: I saw that my sister had purchased a few of these, so I bought one for my new home and love it!! Very well made, and it adds a classy look to my kitchen. Will definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Haley

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love it. Strong Magnet holds securely on fridge. Bottom magnet quickly collects the cap. Good quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Trep

customer_reviews.title: Great bottle opener
customer_reviews.text: What a nifty little bottle opener! I bought this for an outdoor deck and it works exactly as advertised. I am no longer stepping on discarded bottle caps... it catches every one. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Robin R. Reif

customer_reviews.title: Well used well loved.
customer_reviews.text: It's on the fridge covered in caps. Well used well loved.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlyn Cignarella

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Gift!
customer_reviews.text: High quality bottle opener - it looks great and works great! Gave it as a Father's Day gift and it was the favorite. Thank you for making such a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Love how it catches the spent caps
customer_reviews.text: Stick it on the fridge or hang it on the wall. Love how it catches the spent caps. Sturdy bottle opener. Have to find another location to hang the next one.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay Chutas

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband. He loves the quality and look.
customer_reviews.author: KJAM

customer_reviews.title: He absolutely loved it! The item in a great condition and ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this as a gift for my boyfriend. He absolutely loved it! The item in a great condition and the magnet works super well.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra

customer_reviews.title: ... optional screws to mount on a wall is a great plus.
customer_reviews.text: Magnet is very strong and the optional screws to mount on a wall is a great plus.
customer_reviews.author: Ramona Mauch

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful engraving and such a strong magnet! The perfect gift!
customer_reviews.author: Steffi

customer_reviews.title: and it works great. Very convenient to stick this to the refrigerator
customer_reviews.text: Well made, high quality materials, and it works great. Very convenient to stick this to the refrigerator.
customer_reviews.author: Bridget Greene

customer_reviews.title: This product looks really nice - very well crafted
customer_reviews.text: This product looks really nice - very well crafted. The magnets are strong and will hold well. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived on time, looks great and works wonderfully! Magnet backing has a strong hold onto fridge!
customer_reviews.author: Kari

customer_reviews.title: Elegant and Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Looks very elegant and does the job exactly as it promised it would.
customer_reviews.author: dpakk

customer_reviews.title: A must buy!
customer_reviews.text: This works great! I have it on the fridge and works perfectly! It's just as described.
customer_reviews.author: Colin

customer_reviews.title: Love it... but moves around occassionally
customer_reviews.text: Great gift for my husband! My only issue is that it isn't extremely stable at the top of the opener so it tilts side to side if you're not careful. Overall great buy though.
customer_reviews.author: Evie

customer_reviews.title: It looks great but after about 25 bottle caps
customer_reviews.text: Hung this on our refrigerator. It looks great but after about 25 bottle caps, they can fall easily off the magnet. BUT I love this product and is a great addition to any beer drinkers home!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Best bottle opener EVAR!!! :-)
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely the best quality, and most fun, bottle opener I've ever used. The workmanship is top-notch - these folks obviously put a great deal of time and effort into crafting these. I now own two myself and have given two as gifts. I have one mounted outside and it is holding up perfectly to the elements. The other one I have is just magnetically stuck to my fridge and works perfectly this way - the magnets are super strong!
customer_reviews.author: Tim Summers

customer_reviews.title: Looks good but....
customer_reviews.text: Way to much for what you get. It works and looks nice which is why I gave it 2 stars. The base feels very cheap. Only weight is from bottle opener. The mounting magnets are strong but it still slides around on the mounting surface when used. I bought this as a birthday gift and it was well received. Of course they don't know what I paid. I was hoping to like it and buy half a dozen to have on hand for gifts. Just not worth the expense.
customer_reviews.author: J. Wagoner

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!!
customer_reviews.text: This was part of my husbands Father's Day gift. I had "#1 Dad" engraved. And my oh my has it been a hit! He is always bragging about it. And I've used it myself... he has it on our beer fridge in the garage and it works exceptionally well! I was a little skeptical of the strength when I bought it but after using it for a few months now, wow!! It holds to the fridge and pops the beer bottle top off without a wiggle! It is so easy to use and really impressive. It also looks true to photos and decorative. Would definitely recommend this a million times!
customer_reviews.author: MommaBearLenson

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect Bar Accessory!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this bottle opener for outdoor kitchen. It is a great product! It looks exactly like the pictures and listing describes. The magnets are very strong. It doesn't budge from the side of my refrigerator when a bottle is opened! I will order this product again as a gift. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney

customer_reviews.title: Best I've ever seen
customer_reviews.text: This bottle opener is amazing. The magnet for both the fridge and the cap catcher are extremely strong. The finish on this product is nice. It looks great. I bought this for my husband and he absolutely loves it. When he first got it he was having fun seeing how much the magnet could hold. It held a metal lunchbox to it. So happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GET ONE NOW!!!
customer_reviews.text: What a beautiful solid piece! Excellent gift...so nice I had to get one for myself (through the Nason's website directly) even though I don't pop many caps! My friend opened the gift in a restaurant. Even the server was so impressed when he picked up a 3-piece place setting wrapped in a linen napkin and the entire thing clinged to the base of the bottle opener! Excellent product. My new go-to for gifts!
customer_reviews.author: L. Dunning

customer_reviews.title: This works so great! We keep it on the fridge
customer_reviews.text: This works so great! We keep it on the fridge, and at the end of the week, take all the caps and put them in the garbage. Not only is it fun and interesting, it makes it easy!
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 2

customer_reviews.title: I love the fact that I can mount it magnetically onto ...
customer_reviews.text: I love the fact that I can mount it magnetically onto the side of the refrigerator. Instead of finding bottle caps on the floor or left on the counter, they are all hanging in the same spot waiting to be cleared. My husband's life expectancy has just gone up by several years!
customer_reviews.author: Patrick M.

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, works great too
customer_reviews.text: Looks great, works great too. The magnet is hidden in the bottom third and really does a great job of catching the caps. The other magnets that stick it to the door are strong too, and do a good job of holding it on the door.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Kearney

customer_reviews.title: Exceeds expectations.
customer_reviews.text: Extremely pleased with the product. Its powerful magnets allow it to stick directly to my fridge (or any other metal surface) and open any bottle effortlessly. High quality and durable. Performs exactly as advertised. Mounting screws are included in case you wish to mount it on a non magnetic surface.
customer_reviews.author: Mark D. Schanke

customer_reviews.title: Great gift!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this as a gift for my husband. It attaches securely to the refrigerator with the attached magnets and catches bottle caps before they fall on the floor. Not only is it functional but it looks great too!
customer_reviews.author: Breanna

customer_reviews.title: Very Very well made
customer_reviews.text: Very well made. Packaged well. Made in USA!!!! I gave it as a gift. My son loved it
customer_reviews.author: P. Dale

customer_reviews.title: love this!
customer_reviews.text: My Boyfriend loves him beer opener! I think it help about 32 until we finally had to throw out all the caps. Sits nicely on the side of our fridge with little to no movement at all. The magnet is super strong!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works as promised
customer_reviews.text: The magnetic backing is strong, so it stays put on the fridge, even when you're opening a bottle. The magnet that catches the caps is also quite strong and easily holds 20+ caps. The wood is really nice, and it looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Jones

customer_reviews.title: Gave as a gift and the recipient loved it so much that he purchased another one for ...
customer_reviews.text: Gave as a gift and the recipient loved it so much that he purchased another one for his outdoor living space!
customer_reviews.author: PJW

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the walnut with maple inlays, the color was lighter than the way it looked in the picture but it works awesome! Just what i was looking for
customer_reviews.author: KatieK38

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy construction. Well made and love how it grabs ...
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy construction. Well made and love how it grabs the bottle caps for you.
customer_reviews.author: TashaMD

customer_reviews.title: Such a cool product and great gift
customer_reviews.text: Such a cool product and great gift. Very sturdy and it works surprisingly well! Very good quality. Would give this gift again to any other bottle-opening drinkers!
customer_reviews.author: bsoulful

customer_reviews.title: Dad approved
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item for my Dad for Father's day. Nice quality product. I liked how there was a blank cap attached so he could see the magnetic magic work right out of the box. He even sent me a text later in the day telling me that a buddy came over and also approved :) Thanks again. 4 Stars due to it's price.
customer_reviews.author: Brett Shevik

customer_reviews.title: and looks great!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about the magnet being strong enough, but it certainly does work, and looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff B.

customer_reviews.title: Overall great
customer_reviews.text: Really neat product. Only gave 4 stars because it sometimes slides down the fridge when being used. Mostly holds well though. Fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Jenifer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and well made
customer_reviews.text: Gave as a gift. Very well made, solid. She loved it!! Can't wait to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Audrey

customer_reviews.title: Looks good: works great!
customer_reviews.text: Everyone who's tried it was impressed with it. I do like the fact that it works mounted on the side of the refrigerator.
customer_reviews.author: Norman L. Clark

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: Great product and company, highly recommended. Already bought a second one and sent it to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Fun to use because of the magnets. looks great in my bar and kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: PB

customer_reviews.title: Life improvement.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely awesome. Beautifully built and the magnet is extremely strong; both to catch the caps, and stay on the fridge. 10/10 would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Scotticus Luzicus

customer_reviews.title: A hit!
customer_reviews.text: I Bought this for my new son in law . My daughter said he loved it more than anything she got him!
customer_reviews.author: Linda C. Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: Workmanship is excellent. Very prompt shipment
customer_reviews.text: Works as described. Workmanship is excellent. Very prompt shipment. Glad I bought it. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Hector I Chavez

customer_reviews.title: The walnut finish is beautiful, it was great they included screws to mount ...
customer_reviews.text: The walnut finish is beautiful, it was great they included screws to mount it but it looks so great on the fridge. Truly worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Breznai

customer_reviews.title: Overall a great product. Strong magnets
customer_reviews.text: Overall a great product. Strong magnets. Good craftsmanship. However there is some shading differences from side to side. If that bothers you (it didn't me) then I would go with one without inlays.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quite good, just not perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looking bottle opener, it functions pretty well. My only complaint is compared to some similar versions of this product sometimes the magnets aren't quite strong enough to stop the entire thing from moving up on the fridge when opening a bottle. It's not a terribly common occurrence and its not that much of an inconvenience, thus only 1 star. Also the stronger magnets ones usually don't have as nice of a design.
customer_reviews.author: azwildcat

product_meta.title: Nason's of Maine Magnetic Bottle Opener and Cap Catcher
product_meta.description: Color:Walnut with Maple InlayHandcrafted magnetic bottle openers from Nason's of Maine made from beautiful hardwood and high powered rare earth magnets, our bottle openers catch and hold over 65 caps. A great present for a college student or husband or anyone who frequently pops a top. Our openers are of the highest quality. We use 3 premium wood species, American walnut, hard maple and utile mahogany. We do not simply stain cheap wood. Our catching magnet has a pull force of over 70 pounds and can truly hold over 65 bottle caps. All openers are made in Maine, USA and we proudly stand by each and every bottle opener we create. Features - catches over 65 bottle caps - measures 8"(l) x 3.5"(w) x.75"(h) - additional magnets installed for instant magnetic mounting - polished stainless steel bottle opener - stainless steel screws and anchors included for optional wall mounting - water resistant polyurethane to protect against your friends spills and we offer custom engraving. (We engrave with Georgia font and in capital letters at the base of the opener) - choose the custom engraving option for any of our products above - choose your ideal text (last names are a big hit) - order and receive your engraved opener in 3-5 days treat your friends or yourself to a gift that will last for years to come.
feature_bullets: Power: Openers hidden magnet easily catches over 65 bottle caps
Quality: Made from beautiful American walnut hardwood
Ease: Magnetic mounting included for instant use
USA made: Handcrafted in Maine - please beware foreign copycats on amazon
Stock: If stock is low please visit our Nason's of Maine website
